ygData.subject: Meeting Reminder
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone! This is a reminder that the list meeting is tonight at 6pm PST on Brell Serelis in East Freeport.  To participate, simply create a newbie human
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Everyone!

This is a reminder that the list meeting is tonight at 6pm PST on Brell
Serelis in East Freeport. To participate, simply create a newbie human
and choose Freeport as your home town. Send a tell to Luna when you get
there.

If you already have a character on Brell, you can of course use that
character. If you have difficulty getting your character to Freeport for
the event, consider using a newbie to attend the meeting.

There will be a subsequent newbie hunt for those who wish to hunt and get
some XP.

- Christina
